title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to Urban Transportation Planning and Four Step Travel Demand Forecasting Process, Information Needs for Travel Demand Forecasting, Travel Demand Forecasting: Trip Generation, Trip Distribution, Mode Choice and Traffic Assignment, Land use/ Transportation system and Models
